DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of increased supply of energy, protein, vitamin A and the long chain polyunsaturated fatty acids docosahexaenoic acid and arachidonic acid on growth, brain maturation and cognitive function.
DOC.brief_title: Nutrition, Growth and Development Among Very Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Birth weight below 1,500 grams Written consent to participate from the parents Congenital malformations Clinical syndromes known to affect growth and development Critical illness and short life expectancy If participants refuse to participate
DOC.keyword: Very low birth weight infants (birth weight below 1,500 grams).
